metadata.name: Panda
metadata.description:
A horse is a big personality. Only by understanding it, a person will be able to establish a strong and friendly relationship.

In general, all horses are a very peaceful creature, but at the same time they know how to stand up for themselves. Horses have such an attractive energy that there will not be an indifferent person in contact with this wonderful animal.

When I saw this horse named Panda, I immediately fell in love with her. She is graceful and fantastically beautiful in every way. I see trust and understanding in her eyes. Panda is an interesting and energetic animal. By all means, she will give warmth and care to its owner.

May this piece of artwork hold all of these elements for its NFT 1/1 owner.
